title: TATE LAB WHITE AND RED SAPPHIRE RING, GOLD
description:
The Tate Cocktail Ring features a 2.5-carat oval lab-grown white sapphire, encircled by oval red sapphires and round white sapphires or diamonds. 
 Holiday Production Time: This made to order ring ships 5 - 7 weeks from purchase date.   Please place your order by November 1st for guaranteed delivery before December 25th. Orders placed after this date cannot be guaranteed to arrive in time for the holidays. 
Custom styles can only be returned for store credit.
details:
Metal: 18k gold coated silver or 14k yellow gold

Center stone: Lab-grown white sapphire or diamond
Inner halo: Lab-grown red sapphire
Outer halo: Lab-grown white sapphire or diamond
Stone shape: Oval cut center and inner halo, round cut outer halo

Size: 4-10


Lab-Grown White Sapphire and Red Sapphire Carat:




White Sapphire Center Oval: 2.5 CTW DEW

Red Sapphire Inner Halo: 1.92 CTW DEW

White Sapphire Outer Halo: 0.45 CTW DEW


Lab-Grown Diamond Carat: 


  Diamond Center Oval: 2.5 CTW E/F VS1

Emerald Inner Halo: 1.92 CTW E/F VS1

Diamond Outer Halo: 0.45 CTW E/F VS1 


Stone Color: E/F
Stone Clarity: VS1 
What is Lab-Grown?
